titleStmt.title: SII 7.461: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 461. (A.R. No. 247 of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevi vaḷar tirupponmātu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalamperitu ciṟappa vijayamāmakaḷ
velpuyat tiruppa Icaiyin celviyum Eṇṭicai viḷaṅki nirupar vantiṟaiñca niṇila maṭantaiyai
tirumaṇam puṇarntu cīrvaḷar taruma maṇimuṭi kavitteṉa maṇimuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattu palluyiṟ kellām El
laiyil Iṉpam mika Initeyta veṇkuṭai niḻal ceṅko locci vāḻiyūḻi Āḻi naṭappac cem
poṉ vīrasiṁhāsaṉattup puvaṉammuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya korājakecaripaṉ
marāṉa tribhuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevar vikkiramacoḻapurattu koyi
luḷḷālai Abhiṣekamaṇṭapattu muttuppantaṟkīḻ EḻuntaruḷiIrukka Āṇṭār kaicciṟumaṟayaṉ
kāṭṭi vikkiramacoḻabrahmamārāyar viṇṇappañceytapaṭi jeyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kaḷat
tūrkoṭṭattu śrīmadhurāntakaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu tiruvacciṟupākkattu Āṭcikoṇṭamahā
devaṟkku veṇṭum pūjaikkum Amutupaṭikkum maṟṟum veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum
tevatāṉam peṟaveṇṭum Enṟu viṇṇappañceyya tiruvuḷḷamāy Iṭṭaruḷiṉa Ūr śrīmadhurāNtakaccatu
rvvedimaṅkalattut tenpiṭākai Oṭuvattūr nirnilamum puñcainilamum Itaṉ pāl A
maṇpākkam nīrnilamum puñcainilamum Añcāvatumutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka vi
ṭṭu Ittevar koyilil Eḻuntaruḷat tiruvuḷḷamāṉa kulottuṅkacoḷiśvaramuṭai
yāṟku pūjaikkum Amutupaṭikkum Uṭalāka Oymānāṭṭu vijayarājendravaḷaṉāṭṭu pai
cāṟu nīrnilamum puñcainilamum Iṟaiyili tevatāṉamāka viṭṭatu Ivvūrkaḷāl va
nta kaṭamaikaḷ Ikkoyilt tāṉattāṟke kaṭamai kuṭimai Iṟukka Eṉṟu tiruvāyamoḻi
ntaruḷinār Ippaṭikku Ivai vicaiyarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṅkaikoṇ
ṭacoḻakkaḷappāḷaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai puravari śrīkaraṇaṉāyakam ṉeṭuṅkuṉṟaṅkiḻā
ṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.461 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
